addAgeDescription.message: Adds age of the person after their Date of Birth on IMDb

addWeeklyAverageDescription.message: Adds Weekly Average gross to the IMDb US Box Office page

removeLoadlateDescription.message: Removes the late disaply of images (especially useful if JavaScript is disabled)

showAllDescription.message: Shows all collapsed sections (especially useful if JavaScript is disabled)

biggerThumbsDescription.message: Shows Bigger Thumbnail Images. Normal IMDb Thumbnails width is 32.

amo.message: Firefox restricts some functions on some URLs

error.message: There was an error with the operation
